mapper.select: /* 보험 정보 조회 */ SELECT i.insurance_code, i.user_id, i.goods_code, i.payment_code, i.rental_code, i.insurance_available, i.insurance_sign_up_time FROM tb_insurance AS i ORDER BY i.insurance_code;

/* 보상금청구서 상세 조회 */ SELECT ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code, ibd.insurance_code, ibd.user_id, ibd.goods_code, ibd.payment_code, ibd.accident_date, ibd.accident_type, ibd.accident_content, ibd.insurance_evidence, ibd.bank_name, ibd.account_holder, ibd.account_number, ibd.request_date FROM tb_insurance_bill_detail AS ibd ORDER BY ibd.insurance_bill_detail_code;

/* 보험청구서리스트 조회 */ SELECT ib.insurance_bill_code, ib.user_id, ib.insurance_bill_detail_code, ib.insurance_bill_state_code, ib.insurance_bill_modify_date FROM tb_insurance_bill AS ib ORDER BY ib.insurance_bill_code;

/* 보험청구서리스트 조회(보험청구서코드) */ SELECT ib.insurance_bill_code, ib.user_id, ib.insurance_bill_detail_code, ib.insurance_bill_state_code, ib.insurance_bill_modify_date FROM tb_insurance_bill AS ib WHERE ib.insurance_bill_code = #{insuranceBillCode};

/* 보상급 지급내역 조회 */ SELECT ip.insurance_payout_code, ip.user_id, ip.insurance_bill_detail_code, ip.insurance_bill_code, ip.insurance_payout_price, ip.insurance_payout_date FROM tb_insurance_payout AS ip ORDER BY ip.insurance_payout_code;

/* 보상급 지급내역 조회(보상금지급코드) */ SELECT ip.insurance_payout_code, ip.user_id, ip.insurance_bill_detail_code, ip.insurance_bill_code, ip.insurance_payout_price, ip.insurance_payout_date FROM tb_insurance_payout AS ip WHERE ip.insurance_payout_code = #{insurancePayoutCode};
mapper.update: /* 보상금지급내역 수정 */ UPDATE tb_insurance_payout SET insurance_payout_price = #{insurancePayoutPrice}, insurance_payout_date = NOW() WHERE insurance_payout_code = #{insurancePayoutCode};
